documents.document: Received the books yesterday, so excited to add to Library collection #tlchat #educationmatters https://t.co/Ur9DLE9uPb
Students quickly introduced to wide range of reading material. Will do Musical Chairs with books for Yr 3, 4 & 5 (11 classes total) Cool!
Each chair had a book related to Reading Challenge we danced to Bollywood music, when music stopped one minute of viewing book. #tlchat
25 Ideas to Motivate Young Readers https://t.co/0z9oTnNiV2 via @education_world I did musical chairs today to intro new reading challenge
Thank you @clpe1 this is outstanding! #schoolibrary #tlchat https://t.co/3aNXS2XSkR

Memories of my casual teaching bag early 1990's the book is still in high use and so relevant the shock so important https://t.co/BaQv5hpwnP
Listening to Jeannie Baker made me slow down and reflect I became deeply aware of her creativity and the importance of her books @Sydney_Uni
Superb time spent last night: University of Sydney Artist in Residence Jeannie Baker in conversation with Professor Robyn Ewing @Sydney_Uni
Held 'The Great Book Swap' for teachers this arvo as part of staff meeting. Four Swap sessions planned for next week K-6 @IndigenousLF
'Tidy' was a very special book to read to children (as are all Emily Gravett's books) wish I was there! https://t.co/nAJmYkFIOf
Oh, this was fun to read, I like getting rid of stuff... https://t.co/vK8lE2w4bb
This really did shock Yr 5 https://t.co/PkCR3dfsUP they were born the year YouTube 2005 or Twitter 2006 was launched.
Interesting comments Yr 5 what their parents use WWW for & because they missed out when they were young - making up for it now big time!
Year 5 found https://t.co/sNm6CdOv6p amazing, they were born in 2005/6! A Infographic of the Internet
Great site that you can see students think is cool is ‘In one second on the Internet there are..’ https://t.co/UjcntKM5LJ @airguitarbandit
Great discussion on difference between the Internet and WWW with Yr 5. Light bulb moment when students considered what came first.
History of computers: used this over past years as intro to search skills lessons, still a hit with Yr 5 https://t.co/BXh4uv2EkR @ABCSplash
https://t.co/PkCR3dfsUP Another great info graphic on the History of the Web

Wonder what I would do without books? Hold memories close of childhood visits to the local library - must have sparked something in me...

Superb visit from Emma Quay for K-2, she shared drawings from her childhood and read to the children her delightful stories.
